Key Match Events: LeBron James dropped 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists, with a fourth-quarter takeover that sealed the game for the Lakers.
The Kings gave up a 21-0 run to start the fourth quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Domantas Sabonis praised LeBron James' performance, noting his greatness and the Kings' carelessness with the ball.
De'Aaron Fox commented on LeBron's impressive career and his continued dominance in year 22.
